inn1.comm: loud shout for lbw first up, it pitched outside leg and the loud shout was denied by the umpire.
defended to the off side.
moves forward and defends with an angled bat to point.
moves forward and mistimes the drive back to the bowler.
turned away to the onside to midwicket.

Bangladesh lose their first wicket and it is the big wicket of Tamim, pitches in line with the stumps and strikes the pad, loud appeal and given by the umpire this time. Tamim was not happy, he shows his bat, saying there was an inside edge, but I thought it was a bit high and going down leg too.
defended to the off side.
defended on the track.
Kayes gets the first boundary of the morning, pitches bit fuller and he drives through backward point to the fence.
mistimes the cut to the off side.
outside the off stump and left alone.
good length delivery and Junaid defends to the off side.
fuller delivery outside the off stump and Junaid falls for the drive and gets beaten.
defended to the off side.
pitches and comes back in slightly, mistimes the drive to mid-off.
short of a length delivery angled across and Junaid feels for it and gets beaten.
tucks it through backward square leg for a single.

Zimbabwe get the second wicket, Junaid goes, he flicks it in the air on the onside, Utseya at square leg dives sideways to his right and plucks the ball with one hand in the air, excellent stuff from Utseya, the small crowd present at the ground are stunned.
driven square of the wicket to deep point.
short of a length delivery angled across, beats the outside edge.
gets behind the delivery and defends to the off side.
back of a length delivery and Kayes drives uppishly behind point to the deep.
fuller and pushed to extra cover.
peach of a delivery from Mpofu, pitches and moves away, opens up Kayes, beats the outside edge.
wonderful bowling from Mpofu, moves to play at it and gets beaten.
on the pads and goes to the off side, shy at the stumps and no one is backing up, goes to the deep on the onside, they get three extra runs.
pushed to mid-off.
Kayes drives on the up over cover to the fence.
pitches and moves away to beat the outside edge.
short of a length delivery turned to the onside.
looking to drive through the off side, gets an inside edge down to fine leg.
gets behind delivery and defends down the track.
gets behind it once again and he defends to the off side.
good ball from back of a length and moving away, looking to work it to the onside and gets a leading edge in the air and in the gap through gully to third man.
short down the leg side and through to the keeper.
lovely delivery again, pitches and moves away to beat the outside as Kayes feels for it.
watchfully defended to the off side.
short of a length delivery coming in, Kayes looking to work it through the onside, takes it on the body.
jags and moves away to beat the outside edge, wonderful bowling.
lovely shot from Kayes, drives on the up through mid-off and the ball racing along the turf to the fence.
gets behind the delivery and defends to the onside.
short delivery angled across, off the pad and through to the keeper.
width outside the off stump, cut in the air in the gap to deep backward point.
lovely short rising delivery angled across, Kayes jumps up and lets it go through to the keeper.
edges and falls short of the first slip and goes to the third man fence for a boundary.
off the pad and behind the wicket on the onside.
good length delivery and Raqibul defends from the crease square of the wicket on the off side.
length delivery defended to the off side.
mistimes the drive to mid-off, looking to hit it through the onside.
outside edge in the air and in the gap down to third man.
mistimes the drive to mid-on.
mistimes the drive to the onside.
lovely flowing drive on the up through the off side and through extra cover to the fence for a boundary.
short delivery and Kayes pulls it in the air behind square leg to the fence for a boundary. Good attacking batting.
gets behind the delivery and defends down on the track.
short and wide outside the off stump, Kayes needs no invitation, he cuts hard along the ground behind point and no stopping that.
slower delivery outside the off stump and Kayes watches it and lets it go through to the keeper.
bouncer, a quick delivery from Masakadza, Kayes gets under it and through to the keeper.
slower delivery and defended square of the wicket on the off side.
moves back and turns it behind square leg.
arm ball and Raqibul plays forward, it was clearly off the pad but the umpire has given it a run.
defended to the off side.
comes forward and defends down the track.
turns it behind square leg and Price gets under the skin of the batsmen, with few words.
worked to the onside and good work by Utseya at short midwicket.
fuller and swinging away, Raqibul pushes to the off side to point.
moves back to a short of a length delivery and works it square of the wicket on the onside.
length delivery and Raqibul defends with a straight bat down the track.
short ball and Raqibul mistimes the pull to deep midwicket.
off the pad to square leg.
short and wide outside the off stump, cut in the air just past the hands of backward point to third man.
defended to the onside.
sweeps and misses, strikes the pad, loud appeal and turned down.
uses his feet and pushes to the off side.
defends down the track.
pushes in the air back down the track, almost gave it back to the bowler.
off pad to the onside, few words for Raqibul from Price, who keeps on muttering.
comes forward and defends to the onside.
arm ball and off the pad behind the wicket on the off side.
Utseya strikes for Zimbabwe, it was too full for the sweep and he misses it and the ball strikes the pad in line and a loud shout, given by the umpire. Bangladesh are three down for 47
looking to drive through the off side, gets a thickish edge behind square leg.
driven through the off side to the deep.
driven to extra cover.
lovely delivery from back of a length, beats the outside edge as Shakib plays and gets beaten.
short and wide outside the off stump, cut away in the air behind point to the fence.
drops it to the off side square of the wicket and he takes off for a quick single.
off the pad through backward square leg for a single.
chops it down into the ground to third man.
bouncer and through to the keeper, Kayes gets out of the way in time.
worked away to the onside to midwicket and picks up a single.
once again worked to midwicket for a single.
short down the leg side and signaled a wide.
taps it behind square leg for a single.
fuller delivery played back to the bowler.
good length delivery defended back to the bowler.
down the leg side, flicks it in the air down to long leg.
turned away to the onside.
uses his feet and drives down the ground to long on.
spins down the leg side, signaled a wide.
turned away forward of square leg.
moves back and punches to the off side to mid-off.
swept behind square leg to the deep for couple of runs.
stays in the crease and pushes to the onside to midwicket.
plays forward and off the outside edge to the off side.
mistimes the drive in the air to the left of the bowler.
defended to the off side.
driven down the ground to long off.
hit in the air down to long off, teasing the batsman.
gets a thickish edge to square leg.
moves back and giving himself room but no timing there as the ball spins in and cramps him up, cuts to point.
swept straight to the man behind square leg.
makes room and cuts to point, good field placement this and Price is bowling to the field.
turned away forward of square leg and a quick single taken as Utseya failed to pick up the ball cleanly.
turned away to the onside.
moves back and defends to the off side.
played to the off side.
firing in the arm ball down the leg side and Taibu just getting his pads in the way.
defends to the off side.
uses his feet and not to the pitch off the ball, chips it in the air down the ground to long off.
sweeps and gets a glove and the ball lobs up in the air behind the wicket on the onside, Taibu leaps backwards and takes a splendid catch to dismiss Kayes.
moves back and defends down the track.
pushes to the onside to mid-on.
worked away through the onside to the deep and picks up a single.
moves forward and pushes it back to the bowler.
defends with an angled bat to point.
flatter from Price and Mushfiqur defends back to the bowler.
tucks it to square leg and scampers through for a quick single.
turned away behind the wicket on the onside.
pushes to the onside to mid-on.
cut in the air and just past the outstreached hands off Mpofu behind point.
tossed up delivery and Mushfiqur sweeps in the air to the midwicket fence for a boundary.
swept along the ground to deep square leg.
pushes in the air and in the gap this time to point for a single.
uses his feet and mistimes to the onside.
sweeps along the ground to deep square leg.
short delivery and pulled along the ground to deep backward square leg, Hamilton Masakadza running around in the deep, dives and makes a good save.
pushes to the onside to midwicket.
defended to the onside forward of square leg.
uses his feet and plays it back to the bowler, who throws it back to the keeper.
driven through the off side to the deep for a single.
pushed to the onside to midwicket.
pushes along the track and down the ground to long off.
miscues the drive to the onside, Utseya moves across to field.
full toss turned away behind the wicket on the onside straight to the fielder.
tossed up nicely and Mushfiqur drives uppishly down to long off.
turned away through square leg for a single.
turns and beats the bat as Mushfiqur looking to drive through the onside, Taibu messes the stumping chance, he fails to collect the ball, knocks off the bails with his hands without having the ball.
tossed up wide and Mushfiqur goes for the big booming drive, gets the outside edge and down to third man fence for a boundary.
cut away along the ground to the sweeper on the off side.
pushes to the off side to cover.
played to the onside.
once again cut in the air in the gap and Mpofu chases it down to the ropes at third man.
sweeps a full ball down to deep backward square leg.
moves forward and pushes to the off side.
pushes it down the ground through mid-on for a single.
makes room and cuts along the ground to Taylor at extra cover.
spins down the leg side.
a touch short and he cuts to the sweeper on the off side.
drives along the ground to long off for a single.
comes nicely forward and defends down the track.
looking to work it forward of square leg, gets a thickish edge and goes behind square leg.
comes nicely forward and defends to the onside.
moves with the turn and defends with an angled bat to point.
punches off the back foot to mid-off.
cut away behind point for a single.
played down the ground to long on.
sweeps to deep backward square leg, all along the ground.
drives through the vacant off side to the sweeper.
makes room and cuts to deep backward point, fielded by Mpofu.
moves back and drops it to the onside for a quick single, Taibu gets rid of his gloves and rushes at the ball, picks it up and has a shy at the stumps at the non-strikers end.
worked away through the onside.
played through midwicket for a single.
punches it past the diving bowler to long off.
full toss driven down the ground to long off.
chops it into the ground to point.
driven on the up through the off side to the sweeper cover.
good length delivery defended to the off side to cover.
short delivery and Mushfiqur glides it down to third man for a single.
slower delivery and too short, playing too early, mistimes the pull along the ground to deep square leg, straight to Price.
angles his bat and plays it down to third man and picks up an easy single.
short ball, a quick bouncer and goes over Shakib and he is surprised that is not called a wide.
spins in and Mushfiqur makes room and cuts it to deep backward point for a single, brings up the 50 partnership.
cuts and misses.
dabs it behind the wicket on the off side for a quick single.
stays in the crease and angles his bat and plays to deep backward point, 1000 runs for Shakib as the captain.
inside edges as he looks to play through the onside.
pushes down the ground to long off for a single.
stays in the crease and pushes to the onside.
punches to the off side to extra cover.
short ball and Shakib mistimes the pull to square leg.
cuts it late behind point.
short delivery and Mushfiqur taps it down through the onside for a single.
a wayward delivery down the leg side.
cut away behind point and down to third man, Ervine fields the ball.
played back to the bowler.
turned away behind square leg for a single.
worked to square leg for a single.
short ball pulled along the ground to deep midwicket.
makes room and dabs it down to short third man.
comes forward and defends down the track.
pushes to the onside.
short ball and Shakib swivels it to deep backward square leg for a boundary.
short delivery outside the off stump, chops it down into the ground.
on the pads and tucked away to deep backward square leg for a single.
punches off the back foot to extra cover.
pushes to the onside.
fuller on the off stump. Rahim comes forward and reverse-sweeps or rather reverse paddles it to third man for a boundary
short on the off stump. Rahim rocks back and drives it to cover
short and Rahim pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
short and pulled away to deep square-leg for a single
outside the off stump. Rahim comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
short outside the off stump. Shakib cuts it to deep point for a single
on the leg stump. Rahim comes forward and sweeps it to deep midwicket for a single. The follow-through covered the entire arc
outside the off stump. Shakib defends it to the leg side
slider outside the off stump. Beats Shakib with the delivery and gets the tongue out in joy
on the leg stump. Shakib sweeps it to deep square-leg for a single
on the leg stump. Rahim pushes it to the leg side for a single
on the middle and leg. Rahim comes forward and pushes it to the leg side
on the middle stump. Rahim pushes it to the leg side off the backfoot
on the leg stump. Rahim turns it to midwicket for a single
on the middle stump. Shakib leans across and turns it past midwicket for a single
arm ball on the leg stump and Price belts out a false appeal
fuller on the leg stump. Rahim turns it to the leg side for a single
fuller length delivery on the middle stump. Rahim opens the face of the bat and pushes it to point
short on the middle stump. Rahim drives it to sweeper cover for a single
sharp turn after pitching on the middle stump. Shakib looks to turn it away and gets a leading edge that falls short of a leaping midwicket fielder
short outside the off stump. Shakib cuts it to deep point for a single
fuller on the leg stump. Rahim sweeps it to deep midwicket for  a single

and there it is! How well has he played! Fuller on the leg stump. Shakib sweeps it behind square on the leg side for a single. He gets to his half-century with that single. A captain's knock this and it's not yet finished
uses his feet and drives in the air straight over the bowler's head to the fence for a boundary.
swept to the deep on the onside.
makes room and cuts behind point to the fence for a boundary, brings up the 50 for Mushfiqur, well done.
moves forward and drives along the ground to long off.
plays a late cut down to short third man.
moves forward and drives through the off side to the sweeper.
inside edges to the onside.
lovely delivery on the stumps, holding the line and just goes over the stumps as Shakib pushes at it.
hit in the air over extra cover for a boundary. Bangladesh making an effort to move on.
pushes to the onside.
pushes down the ground to long on for a single, brings up  the 100 runs partnership, wonderful stuff.
yoker length outside the off stump, goes past the bat and for a bye.
fires it down the leg side.
mistimes the drive to the off side.
moves back and works it behind square leg for a single.
full toss driven down the ground to long on.
uses his feet well and drives down the ground to long off.
mistimes the drive to the off side.
tossed up and Mushfiqur slog sweeps and gets it over the fielder at deep midwicket and over the ropes for a six.
makes room and cuts to deep backward point.
moves back and turns it behind square leg.
a touch short and Mushfiqur on the back foot pulls it around to deep midwicket.
pushes to mid-off for a single.
moves back and drives along the ground to deep extra cover.
mistimes the cut to cover.
sweeps it well in the air but unlucky to pick out the fielder at deep backward square leg, Maskadza takes the catch. A good knock from Mushfiqur comes to an end.
cuts and misses.
turned away to the onside for a quick single.
down the leg side, signaled a wide.
fires it down the leg side, another wide.
punches it down the ground to long on.
driven straight back to the bowler.
makes room and cuts through point.
pushes to the off side.
plays with soft hands to cover and picks up a single.
inside edge and goes behind the wicket on the onside.
cut away through the off side to the sweeper.
plays with an angled bat behind point and picks up a single.
driven hard to extra cover.
cuts and misses, through to the keeper.
plays with an angled bat to point for a single.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long off.
quicker delivery and Naeem plays to cover for a single.
dropped by the bowler, hit in the air back to Taylor and he could not get a finger to it as it goes through his hands to the fence.
chips it to the onside.
cut away behind point for a single.
punches down the ground to long off.
full toss driven to the onside.
dropped by Mpofu, a slower delivery and Shakib hits it back to him and he puts one hand to it and drops it, as if he was shaking hands with the ball.
driven down the ground to long off.
pushes to the off side behind the wicket.

a terrible shot to get out, he misses the reverse scoop to a full delivery and he was struck on the pad in front of the stumps and the umpire had no other choice but to give it in favor of the bowler.
plays to the off side and Naeem takes off from the non-strikers end, sent back and he had to dive back.
full toss hit in the air to deep midwicket.
in the block-hole and squeezed out to the off side.
keeping it full and in the block-hole, digs it out back to the bowler.
slower delivery and Shuvo plays to the off side and looking for a quick single, Mpofu rushes to save the run.
mistimed pull to the onside, the fielder in quickly prevents any chance of a run.
low full toss hit in the air down the ground to long off.
full and on the legs, played through square leg for a single, this is the highest score in the series so far.
low full toss and too wide, played to the off side and a single taken.
short ball and Naeem pulls it in the air to the square leg fence for a boundary.
pitched outside leg and pulled to deep midwicket for a single.
arm ball and he misses the shot on the onside, off the pad to the off side.
makes room and cuts it through the off side to the cover fence for a boundary.
keeps it full and this time he drives along the ground to deep extra cover, Ervine chases it and puts in a dive to save a run, excellent effort.
goes for the big slog shot, gets an edge down to third man fence for a boundary, merry time for the batsmen.
wicket for Price as Shuvo charges down the track and looks to go big on the onside, misses it completely and an easy take for Taibu, who gets rid of the bails to dismiss Shuvo.
atrocious bowling, way down the leg side and Taibu cannot gather it, goes to the fence.
right in the block-hole, squeezed out to the onside.
it was in the slot for Mashrafe, who throws his bat at it and gets it over the extra cover fielder to the fence for a boundary.
short down the leg side, pulled in the air down to fine leg.
hit hard along the ground to extra cover, good stop by Utseya.
short ball and Mashrafe pulls and gets a top edge down to fine leg, the ball lands in safe zone.
full toss and Mashrafe gets it to the onside, the man inside the circle could not stop it, goes to the midwicket fence for a boundary.

inn2.comm: short of a length delivery angled into the pads, off the thigh to the onside, Chibhabha takes off for a single, sent back in time.
pitches and moves away, providing the width and Taylor chases it and gets beaten, a waft from him.
gets behind the delivery and defends to the off side.
clips it through backward square leg for a single.
right behind it and defends to the onside.
stands in the crease and square drives to point.
full on the legs and clipped to deep backward square leg for a single.
flicks it through square leg to the deep, Tamim does well running around to field the ball.
stands tall and punches to mid-off.
flicked in the air to deep square leg for couple of runs.
width outside the off stump, cut in the air to deep backward point, desperation stuff from Mashrafe, wonderful effort.
stands tall and punches to the off side, fielded at short extra cover.
short rising delivery outside the off stump, pitches and moves away to beat the outside edge.
gets behind the delivery and defends with a straight bat.
cracking shot from Chibhabha, it was short and Chibhabha gets over it and cuts hard to the cover fence for a wonderful boundary.
moves back to a delivery moving away outside the off stump, left alone.
gets behind the delivery and defends to point.
tucks it behind square leg and picks up an easy single.
played to the off side.
stands in the crease and pushes at it, gets the edge behind the wicket on the onside.
uses his feet and drives down the ground to long off.

arm ball does the trick for Razzak, comes in with the arm and Chibhabha on the back foot is struck on the pad in line with the stumps and a loud shout, given by the umpire, Razzak strikes in his first over.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
pushes it back to the bowler.
gets behind the delivery and defends to the off side.
short of a length delivery and moving away, gets a thickish outside edge down to third man.
outside the off stump and through to the keeper.
pitches and moves away past the outside edge and through to the keeper.
short of a length and coming in, worked it behind square leg and takes a single.
gets behind the delivery and runs it down to third man for a single.
cuts and misses outside the off stump.
uses his feet and driven down the ground to long off.
moves forward and pushes to extra cover.
uses his feet and works to midwicket.
makes room and chops it into the ground.
played to the off side.
behind it and defends down on the track.
outside the off stump and left alone.
pushed to the right of mid-on for a single.
outside the off stump and left alone through to the keeper.
good shot driven on the up through extra cover to the deep.
left alone through to the keeper.
dances down the track and drives along the ground to long off.

tosses it up nicely, teasing Masakadza, comes down the track and looking to go down the ground on the onside, the turn misses the bat and through to Mushfiqur, who gets the rid of the stumps to dismiss Masakadza.
comes forward and defends down the ground.
moves back and works to the onside.
looking for the sweep, misses it and taken on the padd.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
back of a length delivery and coming in, pushes to mid-on.
gets behind the delivery and defends to the off side.
good length delivery and Taibu defends with a straight bat down the track, goes past the bowler and to mid-off.
lovely delivery from outside the off stump, nips back and cuts Taibu in half, goes inside the bat and past the keeper to the fence for byes.
punches to the off side.
punches off the back foot to the off side.
loud appeal as the ball strikes the pad, turned down by the umpire.
uses his feet and drives to the off side to cover.
arm ball and Taylor gets a thickish edge.
down the track and plays it back to the bowler.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
lovely delivery, Taylor stays in the crease and pokes at the delivery as it was turning away, gets the edge and through to Junaid at first slip. Zimbabwe lose their third wicket.
punches to the off side.
stands tall and pushes to the off side to cover.
turned away through square leg to the deep for couple of runs.
stands in the crease and goes after it, misses the bat and just misses the off stump and through to the keeper.
good length delivery and coming in, Taibu defends and gets an inside edge onto the pad, appeal and turned down.
moves forward and drives to mid-off.
good ball on the off stump, defends to the off side to cover.
short delivery down the leg side and through to the keeper as Ervine fails to get some bat on it.
short of a length and moving away, stands in the crease and looking to punch it through the off side, beats the outside edge.
outside the off stump and through to the keeper.
plays it with an angled bat down to third man.
back of a length delivery angled in, tucks it around the corner behind square leg for a single.
short of a length and angled across, edges it in the gap through gully  to the fence for a boundary.
short of a length delivery angled down leg, off the pad and Mushfiqur dives across and takes it, appeals for a catch, turned down as it was off the thigh.
outside the off stump and left alone through to the keeper.
too far outside the off stump and signaled a wide.
gets behind the delivery and defends to the off side.
lovely delivery outside the off stump and moving away, Taibu pokes at it and gets beaten.
outside the off stump and left alone.
punches off the back foot to mid-off.
defended to the onside.

edge and gone, Shafiul strikes picks up his first wicket, pitches it back of a length and makes it move away, Ervine feels for it and gets the edge through to Mushfiqur, who is happy to accept it. Zimbabwe in a spot of bother and are reeling at 39 for 4.
outside the off stump and left alone.
too far outside the off stump and left alone.
off the thigh pad and to the onside.
outside the off stump and left alone.
pushes to the off side to mid-off.

Mortaza cleans up Taibu, it was on a length and Taibu misjuding the line, moves forward and shoulders arms and then he realizes that he has made a mistake as the ball disturbs the timber. Zimbabwe are completely down now.
pitches and moves away as Utseya pokes at it and gets beaten.
defends it down to the onside with one hand off the handle.
moves in line and defends to the off side.
good length delivery defended to the off side.
plays to the off side.
angles it down to third man for a single.
too far outside the off stump and Utseya lets it go through to the keeper.
pushes to the onside to mid-on.
opens the face off the bat and glides it down to third man.
width outside the off stump, Chakabva goes after it and gets beaten, through to the keeper.
good ball coming in, Chakabva stays in the crease and defends with an angled bat to gully.
turned to the onside to square leg.
moves back and punches it to extra cover.
tossed up down the leg side, off the pad and behind the wicket on the onside.
moves forward and pushes to the off side.
turn outside the off stump, pushes at it and gets beaten.
arm ball going down the leg side, strikes the pad, appeal turned down.
coming in from outside the off stump. Chakabva comes forward and defends it to cover
and the same line again as Chakabva stays on the backfoot and defends it to cover
short outside the off stump. Chakabva spots it and gets on top of it. He pulls it and Shuvo dives at midwicket to bring off an acrobatic stop and save four
good length ball outside the off stump. Chakabva defends it to cover yet again
fuller and wider outside the off stump. Chakabva reaches out for the delivery and drives it past the diving cover fielder for a couple
on the leg stump. Chakabva leans across and turns it to deep square-leg for a couple
on the pads. Utseya pushes it to square-leg for a single
short outside the off stump. Chakabva rocks back and cuts it to point
good length ball outside the off stump. Chakabva brings the bat down in time to defend it
Razzak is teasing Chakabva with turn here now as he gets one to turn away from him. Chakabva looks to defend it and is beaten
comes forward and defends it with full face of the bat

fuller on the middle stump. Chakabva looks to have a swipe across the line. When you tend to do it, you have to ensure you get some bat on it, Chakabva doesn't and he is plumb in front. In fact Chakabva was set up for the dismissal as he was beaten with the turn two deliveries ago and now he slips a straight one
turned to short fine-leg
fuller outside the off stump. Utseya comes forward and drives it past cover for a boundary
comes forward and pushes it to the leg side
pushes it back to the bowler
short outside the off stump. A gift for Utseya! He pulls it over deep midwicket for a six and Utseya is winning the battle of the captains
comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
pushes it back to the bowler
pushes it to covers off the frontfoot
spears it onto the pads as Cremer digs it out and pushes it back to the bowler
struck on the pads outside the off stump, thus negating the appeal from the bowler and the fielders
fuller on the middle stump. Cremer turns it to midwicket for a single
now de Silva gives Cremer a reprieve as he was struck in front of the stumps and looked to be out but de Silva thinks otherwise
with the field in, Cremer comes down the track and lofts it over mid-on for a boundary
pushes it to cover
pushes it back to the bowler
turns a fuller delivery on the leg stump to square-leg
short outside the off stump. Cremer rocks back and cuts it to point
turned to midwicket off the backfoot
pushes it back to the bowler
on the middle stump. Utseya stands tall and pushes it to midwicket
on the leg stump as Utseya pushes it to leg side for a single
fuller on the off stump. Cremer comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
off the pad to the onside.
taps it to square leg for a single.
arm ball going down the leg side, strikes the pad and appeal turned down.
defended to the onside.
uses his feet and hits it well over the mid-on fielder to the fence for a boundary, wonderful footwork.
arm ball. the quicker delivery and pushed back down the track.
moves forward and pushes to the off side.
plays square of the wicket on the off side to deep point.
coming in with the arm and Cremer plays it back to the bowler.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long off.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
moves back to the arm ball and pushes to mid-on.
moves back and punches it down the ground to long off.
pushes to the off side.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
drives along the ground to extra cover, good stop that.
moves back and punches to mid-on.
tossed up nicely, pushed back down the track.
nice firm drive to mid-off.
length delivery angling in, Cremer drives and gets beaten.
too full and Cremer squeezes it down to third man.
pushes to the onside to mid-on for a single.
bouncer and through to the keeper, way over his head, signaled a wide.
moves forward and pushes to the off side.
good shot, moves forward and times this well, the ball racing along the turf to the cover fence for a boundary.
defends to the onside.
moves back and punches to the off side to cover.
good ball and Utseya is opened up as he defends.
good ball pitches and hits the pad outside the line as Utseya misses the sweep.
played to square leg for a single.
drives to mid-off.
played through the onside to the deep for couple of runs.
punches through the off side to the sweeper.
moves forward and plays to cover, a slight misfield allows the single.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long off.
drives down the ground to long on.
driven back to the bowler.
quicker delivery and Cremer pushing at it gets the outside edge to short third man.
Cremer creams it through the off side, cuts it to the cover fence, good shot.
works it wide of mid-on for a single.
moves back and works it to short fine leg.
moves back and defends to the off side.
taps it through square leg and picks up a single.
turns it around to backward square leg for a single.
comes forward and defends.
full toss mistimed back to the bowler.
moves forward and mistimes the shot along the track.
defends to the onside and fielded by Shakib.
hit hard in the air and to the left of Shuvo at extra cover, who drops it, would have been an excellent catch. Was flying in the air as he attempted the catch.
works it through backward square leg.
driven back to the bowler.
moves back and punches to the off side, fielded by Shuvo.
looking to work it through the onside, off the back foot.
uses his feet and drives to mid-off.
flat and fuller, pushed back to the bowler.
down the leg side.
lovely delivery from Shakib, spins and turns away as Cremer misses the drive, Mushfiqur collects the ball and whips off the bails to dismiss Cremer.
plays to short fine leg.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
defends with an angled bat to point.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
off the pad to the onside.
cut to point straight to the fielder.
too short from Shuvo and Utseya pulls it well along the ground to midwicket fence.
works it to midwicket for a single.
mistimes the drive down the ground to long off.
off the pad to the onside.
moves back and punches it through the off side to the sweeper cover.
pushes to the off side to cover and takes a quick single.
hit in the air and mid-on desperately tries to catch it, goes over him to the fence for a boundary.
off the pad to square leg, Mushfiqur gets rid of his glove and rushes to pick up the ball.
swings it in air over midwicket to the fence for a boundary, Masakadza trying to get a few boundaries.
moves back and pushes at the delivery to the off side, Shakib dives full length to his left and fails to hold on to the ball, a tough chance but it still counts as a drop.
defended to the off side.
works it through midwicket for a single.
pushes it back down the track.
uses his feet and plays back to the bowler.
short ball pulled to long on.
down the leg side.
driven straight back along the track.
taps it to square leg for a single.
good length delivery defended to the off side.
good length delivery defended to the off side.
drops it softly to the off side and picks up a quick single.
hit in the air and in the gap wide of mid-on to the fence for a boundary. Masakadza charging down the track to Shafiul.
short delivery outside the off stump, upper cuts and slices it high in the air and behind the wicket on the off side, Mushfiqur calls for it and settles under the ball to take the catch.
plays and misses outside the off stump.
driven firmly back down the track.
turns it around and behind square leg.
stands in the crease and pushes to the off side.
plays to the onside to midwicket.
down the leg side.
punched off the back foot to sweeper cover.
gets a leading edge to the off side, Shuvo shouts for something don't know why, thinking that the ball must have hit the pad.
tucks it off his hips to deep square leg, fielded by Mashrafe.
inside edge and it just missed the leg stump and down to fine leg fence for a boundary.
plays and misses outside the off stump.
short outside the off stump and Price lets it go, few words from the Bangladesh players.
short rising delivery, a bouncer, way too high for any cricketer to touch, signaled a wide.
cuts it down to third man for a single.
off the pad to square leg.
pushes to the off side to cover.
hit along the track and past the diving mid-on, who gets an hand to it.
punches it through the off side to the sweeper.
pushes to the onside.
moves forward and drives, gets an edge down to fine leg.
down the leg side.
looking for the sweep initially and then changing his mind to play the cut shot to backward point.
defended to the off side.
comes forward and defends to the onside.
works it through midwicket.
drives firmly down the ground to long off.
pushes down the ground to long on.
driven down the ground to long on once again.
uses his feet, takes it on the full and drives it to deep midwicket.
looking to work it through the onside, off the pad to fine leg.
down the leg side.
defended back to the bowler.
works it to midwicket.
mistimes the drive down the ground to long on.
uses his feet and drives through mid-on.
mistimes the drive in the air to mid-off.
yorker length delivery outside the off stump, trying his best to squeeze it out but could not get any bat on it.
tucks it off his hips behind square leg.
looking to heave it around and gets a thickish edge through square leg to the deep.
pushes to the onside to mid-on.
plays it softly to the off side to point.
off the pad and to the onside.
clips it forward of square leg to the deep for a single.
full and way down the leg side.
defends back down the track.
dropped by Razzak, hit in the air back to him, he grabs at the ball and drops a sitter.
pushed to the onside.
turns it through square leg and picks up a single.
cut away along the ground to the sweeper on the off side.
opens the face off the bat and plays it down to third man.
full on the legs and off the pad to the onside.
turns it behind square leg for a single.
Price backs away and chips it in the air to Shuvo at extra cover, Shafiul and Price face off, few words being uttered. A jig from Shuvo.
bouncer and through to the keeper.
defends with an angled bat to backward point.
down the leg side.
pushes to the onside forward of square leg.
cut behind point, slight misfield but no run taken.
tossed up delivery and an edge to short fine leg.
clips it through square leg to the deep.
comes forward and looks to defend, gets an inside edge, lucky that otherwise it was all over, loud appeal and not given.
pushes to the onside to mid-on and gets to his 50.
mistimes the drive to mid-on.
short rising delivery and Mpofu fends it off to the off side.
another short delivery and off the glove square of the wicket to the off side.
attempted yorker, played back to the bowler.
goes through Mpofu as he pushes at the delivery.
goes all way as Utseya charges at Shakib, he lofts it high and over the midwicket fence.
pushes to the off side.
another massive hit from Utseya, swings it high and goes a long way over the midwicket fence.
down the leg side, Mushfiqur fails to gather it.
sweeps it through square leg to the fence, slaps it.
full toss hit down the ground to long on.
low full toss driven through mid-on .
full toss and Utseya down the track, hits it in the air to deep midwicket and Kayes takes the catch. The umpires check if it was a noball, but it is fine.
